analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x2b022ba25bc7be712dd8e62a5937da54003cdea9.sol#279-290) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x2b022ba25bc7be712dd8e62a5937da54003cdea9.sol#287-289)
